channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cracks are forming in the AI capex boom, warns Morgan Stanley. What to buy and sell.
item.description: Wall Street is getting wary on AI capex spending and Morgan Stanley’s wealth unit is urging clients to beware, and sell small-cap stocks for one.

item.title: I inherited a $30K trust. My bank says I’ll pay $10K in taxes if I cash out. Something is not right.
item.description: “The question is whether to take the cash or leave it to be managed by the bank.”

item.title: Stocks and bitcoin are running on fumes and FOMO — but here’s how the market can steer clear of a selloff
item.description: Trader Jeffrey Bierman says the market can stabilize if fund managers diversify into unloved, cheap sectors

item.title: ‘I don’t come from money’: I received $1.2 million after a family tragedy. Am I foolish to keep it in a money-market account?
item.description: “Having a large sum just sitting there freaks me out.”

item.title: Energy is the best play, and the market’s biggest risk, for the fourth quarter, says this research firm
item.description: Energy prices are abnormally low and supportive of equity markets everywhere. If they were to spike, however, this would represent the biggest risk to...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
